scripts.build:json: json -f ./dist/package.json -I -e "delete this.type; delete this.ava; delete this.devDependencies; delete this.scripts"
scripts.build:copy-files: cp package.json ./dist/package.json &&  cp README.md ./dist/README.md && cp LICENSE ./dist/LICENSE
scripts.build: tsc --project tsconfig.esm.json & tsc --project tsconfig.cjs.json && pnpm run build:copy-files && pnpm run build:json
